name: Asahi Aqua Blue
description: A light and crisp Asahi beer found only in Japan. This beer can easily be enjoyed during Japan's hot summer months at the beach or local fireworks festivals.

name: Tazawako Pilsner
description: A locally brewed pilsner from Lake Tazawa in Akita, Japan. This pislner is great after a swim in Japan's deepest lake or after a long day of snowboarding.

name: Kirin Tanrei Green
description: This reduced sugar Kirin happoshu is light and slightly malty. A great choice when looking to cut calories but still enjoy a refreshing brew in style.

name: Yoho Tokyo Black
description: Made by one of Japan's oldest craft brewers, this porter is perfect for anyone who enjoys a rich and dark porter after a day's work.

name: Asahi Sakura
description: Asahi embraces the seasonal cheery blossom festival (hanabi) with this limited edition release. Same great taste with a great label.

name: Sapporo Classic
description: The classic taste of Sapporo only available in Hokkaido locations. This Japanese classic will take you right to the Sapporo snow festival.
